arts.ttl: Josef Martínez has record hat trick, moves up goals list in Earthquakes' 6-1 rout of DC United
arts.sum: Josef Martínez found the net in the second minute of second-half stoppage time to polish off a league-record seventh hat trick, leading the San Jose Earthquakes to a 6-1 romp over D.C. United on Sunday and moving him into the No. 6 spot on the league’s all-time goals list. Arango scored for the fourth time in his first season with San Jose and has 57 goals in 99 career appearances.
